page.title: 14Population
page.content: Generally speaking,people who live in this area,choose to do so because they enjoy the countryside,with its scenery,its peace and quiet and its healthier air.They are prepared to accept and live with the lack of public services,the need to always travel for life's necessities and the harsh winter climate. Farmers and their families constitute the majority of the small population,the rest is made up from;a few people who have bought property with land which can accommodate their business enterprises,such as a small haulage firm,a handful of professional people who commute into the Manchester conurbation each day and the odd few retired professionals.There are also two families who live on the site of the water treatment works,because the men of the families are employed there
